statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{10 \, x^{3} - 8 \, x^{2} - 10 \, x - 20 , -2 \, x^{3} + 6 \, x + 12 , -2 \, x^{3} + 2 \, x^{2} + x + 2 , 3 \, x^{3} - 2 \, x^{2} - 4 \, x - 8 , -x^{3} + 2 \, x^{2} - 2 \, x - 4\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
